column2: Slightly lethargic; sac'd due to poor health (prolapsed rectum and heavy breathing); T1-right scapula
DCT-TVA; Braf ca; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, heart, lungs, kidney, spleen, liver, tumor
Slightly lethargic; sac'd due to poor health (prolapsed rectum and heavy breathing); T1-right scapula
Brain and skull both appeared in tact.
Large tumor and multiple smaller nodules found on/surrounding lungs (retained with lungs).
Very little healthy lung tissue present.
No cryogenics attempted due to tumor being too small; 1 cell line attempted.
